Global.title: Beurl URL Shortener, Video Compressor, Image Compressor, Upload Images, Upload Videos, Upload Photos
Global.description: Beurl offers features for uploading and sharing 'compressed images,' 'compressed videos,' and 'audio files,' combined with a 'URL shortening' service. It’s a free, secure, and privacy-focused anonymous upload SPACE. With a simple interface, you can easily create short URLs, share images, videos, and audio, making social media sharing more convenient! Supports password protection for photos, videos, and images.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.1_content: The privacy protection policy includes how this website handles personal identifiable data collected when you use the services provided by this website. This privacy protection policy does not apply to websites linked to this website or to personnel not commissioned or involved in managing this website.
privacy.2_title: 2. Collection, Processing, and Use of Personal Data
privacy.2_content:
When you visit this website or use the functions and services provided by this website, we will request that you provide necessary personal data based on the nature of the service. We will process and use your personal data within the specific purpose for which it was collected. Without your written consent, this website will not use your personal data for other purposes.

This website will retain your name, email address, contact information, and usage time when you use interactive features such as service emails or surveys.

During general browsing, the server will automatically record relevant behaviors, including the IP address of the device you use to connect, usage time, browser used, and browsing and click data records. These records are used internally to improve our website services and will not be disclosed externally.

To provide precise services, we will conduct statistical analysis of the content collected from surveys. The results of the analysis, including statistical data and explanatory text, will be used for internal research and may be published as needed, but will not involve specific personal data.

You can request to correct or delete your account or personal data collected by this website at any time. Please refer to the contact information below to submit your request.
privacy.3_content:
This website's servers are equipped with firewalls, antivirus systems, and other security equipment to protect the website and your personal data. Strict protection measures are implemented, allowing only authorized personnel to access your personal data. All handling personnel have signed confidentiality agreements, and any violation of confidentiality obligations will be subject to legal sanctions.

If it is necessary to commission other units to provide services due to business needs, this website will strictly require them to comply with confidentiality obligations and implement necessary inspection procedures to ensure compliance.
privacy.4_content: This website provides links to other websites, and you can access these websites through the links provided. However, please note that these linked websites are not subject to this website's privacy protection policy. You must refer to the privacy protection policy of the linked website.
privacy.5_title: 5. Policy on Sharing Personal Data with Third Parties
privacy.5_content:
This website will not provide, exchange, rent, or sell any of your personal data to other individuals, groups, private enterprises, or government agencies, except in cases with legal grounds or contractual obligations.

The exceptions include:

- Obtaining your written consent.
- As stipulated by law.
- To prevent danger to your life, body, freedom, or property.
- Cooperation with government agencies or academic research institutions for statistical or academic research purposes, provided that the data has been processed to prevent identification of specific individuals.
- When your behavior on the website violates the terms of service or may harm or impede the rights of the website and other users, or cause harm to anyone, and it is necessary to disclose your personal data for identification, contact, or legal action.
- When it is beneficial to your interests.
- When this website commissions vendors to assist in collecting, processing, or using your personal data, we will ensure that these vendors are supervised and managed properly.
privacy.6_content: To provide you with the best service, this website will place and retrieve cookies on your computer. If you do not wish to accept cookies, you can set the privacy level in your browser to high to refuse cookie writing. However, this may cause some website functions to not operate normally.
privacy.7_title: 7. Amendments to the Privacy Protection Policy
privacy.7_content: This website's privacy protection policy will be revised as needed, and revised terms will be published on the website. We will notify users through appropriate means when changes are made.
privacy.8_content: For any questions about this website's privacy policy or to request changes or removal of personal data, please email us at: ooo@example.com.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.1_content: All information on this website, including text, images, videos, audio, links, and other data, is provided for reference purposes only. Although we strive to ensure the accuracy of the information, we do not guarantee that all data is entirely accurate or up-to-date. We disclaim any liability for losses arising from any errors or omissions.
disclaimer.2_content: We will make every effort to ensure that the website operates technically without issues, but we cannot guarantee that the website is completely free from computer viruses, system failures, data loss, or other problems. If users suffer any damage (including but not limited to the aforementioned issues) while using this website, we will not assume any legal liability or compensation.
disclaimer.3_content: Users are solely responsible for any images, videos, or other content they upload, as well as external links pointed to by shortened URLs generated through this website. This website does not assume responsibility for the legality, accuracy, or safety of such content. Users must ensure that their uploaded content does not infringe on others' rights and complies with relevant laws and regulations.
disclaimer.4_content: The shortened URL service provided by this website may encounter security risks, such as malware or phishing sites. Users should evaluate the risks before clicking on shortened URLs. Additionally, if the domain of the shortened URL service provider is reclaimed or the service is discontinued, all shortened URLs using that service may become invalid, causing marketing links to fail.
disclaimer.5_content: Some shortened URL services may collect users' click data, posing a threat to personal privacy. Users should be aware of this and decide whether to use such services accordingly.
disclaimer.6_content: All content on this website, including text, images, videos, etc., is protected by relevant intellectual property laws. Without authorization, users are not permitted to reproduce, distribute, or use this content in any way.
disclaimer.7_content: This disclaimer is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Republic of China]. Users agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of [Republic of China].
disclaimer.8_content: We reserve the right to update this disclaimer at any time, and any changes will take effect immediately upon publication on this website. Users should review the latest disclaimer each time they visit the website. Continued use of this website implies acceptance of the updated disclaimer.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.1_content: Welcome to [Your Website Name] (hereinafter referred to as 'the Website'). By using the Website, you (hereinafter referred to as 'User') agree to comply with these Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as 'the Terms') and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Website. We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time, and such modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on the Website. Continued use of the Website constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.
termsOfService.2_content: The Website provides online services including, but not limited to, URL shortening, sharing of user-uploaded content (text, images, videos, etc.), and other related features. We reserve the right to adjust, suspend, or terminate any or all parts of the services at any time without prior notice and shall not be liable for any resulting losses.
termsOfService.3_content:
Users must be at least [insert appropriate age, e.g., 13 or 18] years old or have the consent of a legal guardian to use the Website.
Users are solely responsible for ensuring that their use of the Website complies with the laws and regulations of their respective jurisdictions.
termsOfService.4_content:
Content Responsibility: Users are solely responsible for the legality, accuracy, and safety of any content they upload or generate through the Website (including external links pointed to by shortened URLs). The Website bears no responsibility for user-generated content.
Prohibited Actions: Users must not:
Upload or share content that is illegal, infringing, obscene, defamatory, or otherwise inappropriate.
Use the Website for malicious activities, including but not limited to distributing viruses, phishing sites, or scams.
Abuse the Website’s services (e.g., generating large volumes of meaningless shortened URLs that disrupt system operations).

If a User violates these rules, we reserve the right to suspend or terminate their access to the services at our discretion and pursue legal action if necessary.
termsOfService.5_content:
The URL shortening service provided by the Website is a convenience tool. Users are responsible for assessing the risks of clicking or sharing shortened URLs.
We do not guarantee the long-term functionality of shortened URLs. If the domain of the service provider is reclaimed, discontinued, or affected by force majeure, resulting in URL失效 (invalidation), we bear no responsibility.
Users should be aware that some shortened URLs may be used by third parties to collect data, and the Website is not liable for such actions.
termsOfService.6_content:
Website Content: All original content on the Website (including text, images, designs, etc.) is protected by the intellectual property laws of the Republic of China (ROC). Unauthorized reproduction, duplication, or use in any form is prohibited.
User Content: Content uploaded by Users remains the property of the User or their rightful licensors. By uploading content, Users grant the Website a non-exclusive, transferable license to store, display, or process such content to provide the services.
termsOfService.7_content:
The Website strives to provide reliable services but does not guarantee that the services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from security risks. We are not liable for losses caused by system failures, viruses, or other technical issues.
The Website is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages incurred by Users from using the Website or its content (including shortened URLs). For more details, refer to our 'Disclaimer.'
termsOfService.8_content:
We reserve the right to terminate or restrict a User’s access to the Website at any time, for any reason (including but not limited to violation of these Terms), without prior notice.
Users may cease using the Website at any time. Upon cessation, provisions related to limitation of liability, intellectual property rights, and legal jurisdiction in these Terms remain in effect.
termsOfService.9_content: Users’ personal data will be handled in accordance with the Website’s 'Privacy Policy.' Please refer to that policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your information.
termsOfService.10_content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of China (ROC). In the event of a dispute, Users agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Republic of China.
termsOfService.11_content: If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at [your contact information, e.g., email address].
